FuncDef: This command configures the source attachment individual identifier for the spoke-sdp. This is only applicable to FEC129 AII type 2.

ParaDef.Info: A Global ID of this router T-PE. This value must correspond to one of the global_id values configured for a local-prefix under config>service>pw-routing>local-prefix context. Values-1 to 4294967295.

The prefix on this router T-PE that the spoke-sdp SDP is associated with. This value must correspond to one of the prefixes configured under config>service>pw-routing>local-prefix context. Values-an IPv4-formatted address a.b.c.d or 1 to 4294967295.
An unsigned integer representing a locally unique identifier for the spoke SDP. Values-1 to 4294967295.
